scripts.dev-init: git submodule init && git submodule update && (for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && git checkout dev); done) && npm run dev-install && npm run dev-check
scripts.dev-check: npm run dev-tslint && npm run dev-tsc && npm run dev-test
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-check && npm run dev-normalize && npm run dev-doc
scripts.dev-install: npm install && npm run dev-install-packages && npm run dev-set-links && npm run dev-use-links
scripts.dev-install-packages: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd $p && npm i); done
scripts.dev-set-links: for p in ./packages/*; do npm link $p; done
scripts.dev-use-links: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && npm run dev-link); done
scripts.dev-normalize: for p in ./packages/*; do cp -a ./normalize/. $p/; done
scripts.dev-all-acp: git add . -A && git commit -m "$M" && git push && for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd $p && git add . -A && git commit -m "$M" && git push); done
scripts.dev-test: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd "$p" && npm run test); done
